course.title: ADM 4329 Personal Selling (3 units)
course.desc: Personal visits and personal contacts remain the most effective way of building a committed relationship between a buyer and a seller, especially in business markets. The course will focus on the acquisition of essential selling skills required to meet the challenges facing sales professionals and on the development of expertise to retain customers and expand business opportunities.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: All ADM core courses at the 1000 and 2000 levels. Course reserved for students: in a B.Com. who completed at least 33 units from ADM core courses, including ADM 2381; in minors or in certificate programs when required.
